ModMetaData.name: QOLTweaksPack
ModMetaData.author: PeteTimesSix
ModMetaData.description:
I think just about everyone that plays Rimworld has their own personal list of gripes and annoyances, little irksome things that don't really detract from the game as a whole but still result in a little bit of frustration when encountered. This tweak pack addresses some of mine.
Tweaks include, and are limited to:
Butchering storage efficiency Meal equivalency New orders Trading stockpiles Surgery estimates Walking off bruises
Customization and disabling individual tweaks supported.
See forum thread for details. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=32807.0
HugsLib for A17 required. Get it here: https://github.com/UnlimitedHugs/RimworldHugsLib/releases
